title: Google Chromeâ€™s password manager is adding a new section for notes
content:
Password managers are a key form of online security, and Google makes it rather easy to get started with a password manager built right into its popular Chrome browser. As that feature continues to get more important, Google is now adding room for notes on the Chrome password manager.

more…

The post Google Chrome’s password manager is adding a new section for notes appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Google is adding a new feature to the Chrome browser's built-in password manager, with a new notes section for adding context and more.
